text: It’s me or doesn’t exist a “includes”/“contains” function for string?
nevermind, just found `string_containing` in operators and expression tests section
ahah I wouldn't have thought of this but ok it works ! thanks you very much !!:+1:
Is there a way, or could there be a way, to upload a Word doc into a rich text field into a HubDB?
I should post this on HubDB, sorry
Anyone know if it's possible to dynamically change the RSS feed URL in a RSS email based on a contact property?
Thanks. Figured as much but thought I'd ask anyway. : )
No problem, if you feel like, you can put it in <http://ideas.HubSpot.com|ideas.HubSpot.com> I don’t see any current asks for it and I know our PMs look at that site regularly
Will do. Currently this is a one-off use case I needed it for but could definitely be nice to have in the future.

hey folks. I've a question similar to what is seen on this thread way back from 2017: <https://integrate.HubSpot.com/t/hide-form-to-users-who-have-already-submitted-it/6382>

With the up-and-commence of custom modules and dynamic hubDB pages, I'm in a situation where I'm attempting to create a workflow where the form is hidden and the content is shown based on a contacts particular stage on a particular list. I cannot use a smart module for this.

Does anyone know if there is something available within the hubL variables or API functions, or would this need to be a fully custom dev project?
